mapper.insert: insert into trip.peopleCnt values(#{str}, 0, 0, 1) on duplicate key update bot = bot + 1
insert into trip.peopleCnt values(#{str}, 1, 0, 0) on duplicate key update guest = guest + 1
mapper.update: update trip.peopleCnt set guest = guest - 1, user = user + 1 where created_at = #{str}
mapper.select: select count(*) from trip.member where role = 'MEMBER'
select * from (select row_number() over (order by created_at desc) rnum, m.* from trip.member m where role = 'MEMBER' order by created_at desc) as `rm.*` where rnum >= #{startNo} and rnum <= #{endNo}
